[{"id":"dev-15897","entityId":"86-18911","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"dev"},{"name":"summary","value":"[Coupon Codes] Parse uploaded coupon codes in background"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Denys Bulakh"},{"name":"created","value":"1549980887013"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"15897"},{"name":"description","value":"

Steps to reproduce:

  1. Open https://www.regiondo.de/resellers/account/couponcodes
  2. Prepare file for coupon codes upload with 50000 codes (or use one attached)
  3. Upload file with coupon codes

Actual result:

After long loading, page reloads with 504 error (Timeout)

Expected result:

Click dummy: https://marvelapp.com/3fb3h94/screen/54711643

File with coupon codes should be uploaded on server and saved on FS, but processing should be done in background.
Reseller should see the table with all his not finished uploads in progress.
Optionally, after we finished processing, we can show supplier notification in dashboard.
Please make limitation of file size to 10Mb max.
We should be able to proceed 50k coupon codes without issues.

Bulakh","issueId":"dev-15897","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Sergey Chorny, Viktoriia Karenko, do you have any references regarding uploading and processing files in background without reload of page i.e.?
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1549981092428,"updated":1549981057757,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-56333","author":"d.bulakh","authorFullName":"Denys Bulakh","issueId":"dev-15897","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Just want to add that it's not exactly upload progress bar, because file itself is uploaded quite quickly. But processing of DB queries and logic beside is quite complicated. So idea is the same but behavior is a bit different as on Dropbox
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1549984423268,"updated":1549981092417,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-56346","author":"sergey.chorny","authorFullName":"Sergey Chorny","issueId":"dev-15897","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Denys Bulakh @Yann Maurer
Well, what about ajax?

First of all we need to upload file, then with ajax we can get progress and success states, and also we can identify wrong codes or duplicates and show it to user, similar to log view when installing something.

For small files, less than 1mb maybe, we don't need log window. For big files we need to split uploaded codes to reasonable chunks, eg. 1k or 5k depends on our own server performance. This way we can show that something still in the progress, chunk by chunk. If process is unfinished we need to keep uploaded file, and we need to show it to user, with text, for example: "There are unfinished coupon codes left. Do you want to rerun?". If codes parsing is completed we can remove uploaded file from server, but would be good to keep track of uploaded files with amount of codes parsed from it, to be able to see what was already uploaded (this is useful for multi-user environment).

References:
https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/FileReader
https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/File/Using_files_from_web_applications
https://tutorialzine.com/2013/05/mini-ajax-file-upload-form
https://github.com/pqina/filepond
https://www.dropzonejs.com/
https://mailru.github.io/FileAPI/

Design examples:

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1549991875743,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-56348","author":"d.bulakh","authorFullName":"Denys Bulakh","issueId":"dev-15897","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Sergey Chorny, yes, generally idea was exactly to show progress. But it's not only about file upload, we need to process data to DB so we can't use existing solution for file uploading. But we can take UI, that's true.

So this task should be done in two parts:
  • Backend dev prepares controller and logic for:
- Storing file into file system
- Create table in DB and adding row on each file upload to track progress
- Create queue and worker the same as for reports generation, which will process files and updates status in DB
- Controller to return all the files from customer or exact file by stored ID with progress data

  • Frontend developer then will do:
- Change upload form into dynamic one, which will upload file to given controller
- Adding progress bar to track and show file status
- All the magic with CSS :)

Yann Maurer, please confirm if we can proceed in such way and it make sense to do it now. Thanks!
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1549998844313,"updated":1549984423253,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-63891","author":"alexander.bechte","authorFullName":"Alexander Bechte","issueId":"dev-15897","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

URLhttps://www.regiondo.de/resellers/account/thisiswherewehaveanissue
Product ID103XX
Account emailreservation@supplierdomain.com
Supplier ID92XX
Order #19939XXXXX
Novomind Ticket ID293XX
EnvironmentWindows 10, Chrome Version 68.0.3440.106

Steps to reproduce:

  1. Login to staging environment (demoaccount@regiondo.de)
  2. Book gift certificate Booking number 1575299716019010800
  3. Redeem Gift certificate (RGVRKETDBPI)

4- After redeeming gift voucher , customer is redirected to success page

5- change URL from https://regiondo-demo-account.regiondo-dev-de.de/voucher/redeem/success/id/21335 to https://regiondo-demo-account.regiondo-dev-de.de/voucher/redeem/success/id/21305

Actual result:

After changing the URL, Im able to redeem ticket for other customers

Expected result:

redeeming others ticket by changing Url should not be possible

URLhttps://regiondo-demo-account-muenchen.regiondo.fr/packs-promo
Product ID56647
Account emaildemoaccount@regiondo.de
Supplier ID9357
EnvironmentWindows 10, Chrome Version 68.0.3440.106

Step to reproduce:

1- Go to Dashboard » Manage Offers » My Offer Bundles
2- Preview offer ID 56647

Actual result:

We can't buy gift certificate for bundle activities

Expected result:

  • FRONT END

1- Add Gift voucher module to bundle offers

1- A : 1 gift certificate code should be valid of all bundle activities.

1- B :Wen customer book more than 1 bundle tickets, propose :

  • X Single gift certificates
  • 1 Gift certificate valid for X people

2- After buying gift voucher for bundle offer, Customer should be able to redeem his voucher in the normal redeeming link and in POS

2- A : Redeeming voucher template, should propose
Font end :
Back end :

2- B- Show Custom order option if the Redeeming voucher template if bundle offer require one

2- C : if there is no availabilities , show supplier information (Company name , phone , Email address)

Unfortunately there is no appointment available, we invite you to contact %s company name :
%s phone
%s Email address

Wording
EN : Unfortunately there is no appointment available, we invite you to contact the supplier
FR : Malheureusement il n'y a pas de rendez-vous disponible, nous vous invitons de contacter le prestataire
DE : Leider ist kein Termin verfügbar, wir laden Sie ein, sich mit dem anbieter in Verbindung zu setzen:

  • POS

3- Ability to buy Gift voucher in POS

3- A- Display bundle Offer when we select Gift certificate

3- B - Same logic as in Front- end should be applied in POS

  • 1 code valid for all bundle activities.
  • Wen customer book more than 1 bundle tickets, propose :
  • X Single gift certificates
  • 1 Gift certificate valid for X people
  1. Availability of bundle voucher should be taken from Dashboard » Manage Offers » Ticket validity

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1575620864911,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"88-64220","author":"alexander.bechte","authorFullName":"Alexander Bechte","issueId":"dev-15988","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Maksym Hopei @Walid Dechri

Out solution for displaying the tickets after redeeming a bundle gift certificate:

Case: We have a Bundle with includes 4 offers and 3 attendees

1. ONE Gift certificate valid for X people
1.1 The user buys the ONE gift certificate for 3 people
1.2 The user redeems the gift certificate
= The user receive 4 PDF for each offer included in the bundle

Why: We can keep the structure which we already have for gift vouchers which include several attendee.

2. 3 Single gift certificates
1.1 The user buys 3 gift certificates for the 3 people
1.2 The user redeems the gift certificates
= The user receive 12 PDF = for each offer and attendee (3*4)

We only create one barcode - not for each offer included in the bundle.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1575642995156,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}]
